TEXT.BibTeX_citation: @misc{Wiki_ami_Qapuciu, title = Qapuciu, year = 2025, month = May, day = 5, note = {In Wikipedia [Amis]}, url = {https://ami.wikipedia.org/wiki/Qapuciu} }

S.FORM: Qapuciu Itiniay i Xinyi Cen no Nantou ko Qapuciu a niyaro', 105 ko sa'osi no parod no loma', 321 ko sa'osi no tamdaw. 55% ko ka'aloman no Yincomin, polong han i, 175 ko tamdaw; o roma sato i, 45% ko ka'aloman no roma a finacadan, polong han i, 146 ko tamdaw. O pa-sin-to no ka'aloman no tamdaw no kasafinacadan i, ko Bunun54%, Tayal1%.

Qapocio Itiniay i Xinyi Cen no Nantoo ko Qapocio a niyaro', 105 ko sa'osi no parod no loma', 321 ko sa'osi no tamdaw. 55% ko ka'aloman no Yincomin, polong han i, 175 ko tamdaw; o roma sato i, 45% ko ka'aloman no roma a finacadan, polong han i, 146 ko tamdaw. O pa-sin-to no ka'aloman no tamdaw no kasafinacadan i, ko Bonon54%, Tayal1%.
